rules_text:
Name a nonland card name. Search each player’s graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with the same name and exile them. Each player shuffles.
Elicit Sorcery {1}{B}{B} [i](You may cast this as a Sorcery instead of as a Sorcery Creature for {1}{B}{B}, putting it into the graveyard as it resolves.)[/i]
